Posts.Content: Aug 2, 2010 04:57PM Alenushka wrote: Hello ladies, I am new to the site and is so excited to start participating in the discussions.  I am Stage IV with bone and liver mets (multiple lesions). Tried pretty much everything and finally ended up with Xoloda and Avastin.  I am HER2- so can't have Herceptin.  So I would also love to hear about any success stories with liver mets. Thanks, Yelena
Posts.Title: Liver Mets...any effective treatment? njboo11 njboo11
